techmeme.title: Spotify expands daylist, a personalized playlist that evolves through the day depending on listening habits, globally for free and adds support for 14 languages (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Alibaba will let shoppers check out via Tencent's WeChat Pay on its Taobao and Tmall shopping platforms, as Chinese government crackdown on Alibaba ends (Bloomberg)
Ubisoft stock fell by 10%+ to a ten year low in the past two days, giving it a market cap of €1.99B, following the lukewarm reception to Star Wars Outlaws (Tom Henderson/Insider Gaming)
Blackstone agrees to acquire Australian data center operator AirTrunk in a deal valuing the company at around $16.1B (Bloomberg)
In comments to UK's CMA from July 29, Microsoft says Apple's changes to App Review Guidelines aren't enough for it to operate a native iOS Xbox Cloud Gaming app (Tom Warren/The Verge)
